results.name: Sign(n) (with offset -1): a(n) = 1 if n>0, = -1 if n<0, = 0 if n = 0.
comment: For nonnegative n, partial sums of A063524 (characteristic function of 1). - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Sep 08 2002
For nonnegative n, characteristic function of positive integers. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 01 2011
Central terms of the triangle in A152487. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 06 2008
n-th prime mod 2 (with offset 1,1). - _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 04 2009
reference: T. M. Macrobert, Functions of a Complex Variable, 4th ed., Macmillan and Co, London, 1958, p. 90
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1).
formula: For n>=0, a(n) = A000007(0^n). - _Jaume Oliver Lafont_, Mar 19 2009
a(0) = 0, a(n) = n/|n| or |n|/n for n != 0. - _Jon Perry_, Sep 20 2012
